'''Grainfruit Puffer''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Grainfruit Puffer is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|"Collective of Plenty"}} guarded by a camp.
